meanings.definition: Involuntary contraction of the muscles around the eye.
meanings.sent1: Her blepharospasms made it difficult for her to keep her eyes open for long periods.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with blepharospasms after noticing his frequent eye twitching.
meanings.sent3: During the funny movie, his blepharospasms made it seem like he was winking at everyone.
meanings.sent4: The blepharospasms of anxiety gripped her eyelids tightly during the stressful presentation.
meanings.sent5: The blepharospasms caused her eyes to flutter uncontrollably, drawing attention from those around her.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by uncontrollable blinking or twitching of the eyelid.
meanings.sent1: His blepharospasms were so severe that he had to wear sunglasses to hide them.
meanings.sent2: She experienced blepharospasms whenever she was under a lot of stress.
meanings.sent3: The blepharospasms in his left eye always seemed to act up when he was nervous.
meanings.sent4: The blepharospasms were like a Morse code message being sent by his eyelids.
meanings.sent5: The blepharospasms were a constant reminder of his struggle with the eye condition.
